SEARCH
Package com.robotgame

Class GameField

java.lang.Object
com.robotgame.GameField
public class GameField extends Object
The GameField class represents the game field. It contains methods for initializing the game field, setting the positions of the robot, wolf, home, strawberry, and soup, removing the strawberry and soup, and updating the game field.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    initializeField()
    Initializes the game field by setting all elements of the board to "-".
    static void
    removeSoup(Soup soup)
    Removes the soup from the game field by setting its position to a random position between (0, 0) and (8, 8).
    static void
    removeStrawberry(Strawberry strawberry)
    Removes the strawberry from the game field by setting its position to a random position between (0, 0) and (8, 8).
    static void
    setPosHome(Home home)
    Sets the position of the home on the game field.
    static void
    setPosSoup(Soup soup, Strawberry strawberry)
    Sets the position of the soup on the game field, avoiding the position of the strawberry.
    static void
    setPosStrawberry(Strawberry strawberry, Soup soup)
    Sets the position of the strawberry on the game field, avoiding the position of the soup.
    static void
    setStartPosRobot(Robot robot)
    Sets the position of the robot on the game field.
    static void
    setStartPosWolf(Wolf wolf)
    Sets the position of the wolf on the game field.
    static void
    updateGameField(Robot robot, Wolf wolf, Home home, Strawberry strawberry, Soup soup)
    Updates the game field by printing the icons of the home, wolf, robot, strawberry, and soup at their respective positions on the board.

    • removeStrawberry

      public static void removeStrawberry(Strawberry strawberry)
      Removes the strawberry from the game field by setting its position to a random position between (0, 0) and (8, 8).
      Parameters:
      strawberry - The strawberry object.

    • removeSoup

      public static void removeSoup(Soup soup)
      Removes the soup from the game field by setting its position to a random position between (0, 0) and (8, 8).
      Parameters:
      soup - The soup object.

    • updateGameField

      public static void updateGameField(Robot robot, Wolf wolf, Home home, Strawberry strawberry, Soup soup)
      Updates the game field by printing the icons of the home, wolf, robot, strawberry, and soup at their respective positions on the board. If the strawberry or soup needs to be removed, it prints '-' instead. It also prints a line of asterisks at the end.
      Parameters:
      robot - The robot object.
      wolf - The wolf object.
      home - The home object.
      strawberry - The strawberry object.
      soup - The soup object.
